Description:
Amazing Opportunity
This brand new quality built home offers first home buyers or the savvy investor an amazing opportunity into the Geelong market place. Centrally located to all of the must have amenities including Newcomb?s two Shopping Centre?s, Medical Clinics, Primary, High Schools and The Gordon Tafe?, Swim and Sport Centre, plus bike trails all just moments away.
This wonderful three bedroom two bathroom single story townhouse offers a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen zone with contemporary quality finishes throughout. The kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances, including gas stove and dishwasher and features gorgeous stone bench tops, breakfast bar and ample storage.
The master bedroom offers - walk in robe and ensuite, with the two additional spacious bedrooms comprising built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes a stand up shower, bath, vanity and separate toilet.
Additional extras include ducted heating, a single remote lock up garage, landscaped frontage with a stunning façade and much more. This Townhouse is an easy buy to live in or add to the portfolio as a low maintenance, set and forget investment with rental potential of $300 - $320 per week or 5.2% per annum. Vendor says sell!
****

Description:
Fabulous, Affordable Unit
This fabulous home or investment opportunity in an owner occupied tranquil complex is literally within walking distance to all of the must have amenities including Newcomb Shopping Centre, Public Transport, Medical Clinics, and much more, all just moments away.
This wonderful one bedroom one bathroom unit offers a light and airy open plan kitchen to living zone with new tiling throughout, gas heating and cooking, new ceiling fans and a brand new Rinnai hot water service which offers low cost living.
In addition the unit comprises a great sized bedroom with built in wardrobes and ensuite bathroom with a stand up shower, vanity and brand new toilet. The laundry room off the kitchen, offers additional storage space and leads out onto an ample sized maintenance free paved court yard. Plus with a single lock up garage, this unit won?t last long!
Move in or lease out with a rental return of approx. 5.7% per annum at $200 per week. The owner is also offering the option to include all of the existing furnishings and appliances as inspected as well as a new BBQ, Foxtel and International Satellite dishes.
****

Description:
Ready to get into the market?
Great opportunity to get into the market with this solidly built 3 bedroom brick veneer family home. Situated at the end of a quite court and with a public reserve alongside the property, this property is ripe for the picking. The home has a wide driveway leading down into single car garage and a huge backyard. The home is currently tenanted to a long term tenant with a rental return of approx. 5.7% per annum.
Situated on a good sized allotment of 573ms approx. with plenty of scope to utilize the outdoor areas and room to store the boat or caravan and still have plenty of room to entertain. Located close to all amenities of the Newcomb Shopping Centres and Bellarine Shopping Village and with plenty of access to public transport and less than 10 minutes drive from the CBD this property won't be on the market long.

Description:
A Real Surprise Package
• Bordering Newcomb, this well presented property is surrounded by quality modern homes and has immediate street appeal. You will be pleasantly surprised when stepping into the spacious lounge that opens onto a generous family/meals area and adjacent modern kitchen with stainless appliances and D/W. The master bedroom has a walk in robe and ensuite and the other two have built in robes and are serviced by a family size bathroom. Light is welcomed in to the living areas via the lovely undercover entertaining area and the double garage has a remote door and a rear roller door allowing access to the generous rear yard.. Extras include split systems a/c, gas heating, ceiling fans in all the bedrooms and a quiet court location. Walking distance to shops, schools and only 9 years old, this is one property not to be missed!
****

Description:
"Practically New, Modern Unit"
This near new unit is in pristine condition. You will be impressed with the quality and the presentation from the moment you enter. The spacious and functional floor plan make this home a great downsizer, first home or investment property. On offer is an open plan layout with quality kitchen inclusive of stainless steel appliances, stone benches and ample storage. Well positioned to overlook the spacious dining/living area out to the beautiful courtyard beyond. There are two generous bedrooms with both offering built in robes, a large central bathroom complete with bath and separate toilet. Reverse cycle air conditioning and electric blinds will provide year round comfort. Outside the gardens are private and low maintenance complete with a single remote garage completing this wonderful home. Situated in a quiet no through road and conveniently located to all amenities and public transport.

Description:
Solid Brick Home Or Ideal Investment
Set behind a cute picket fence and cottage garden, this solid 3bd, 1 bath brick home in a quiet street will delight.
Comprising of large L shaped main lounge with gas fire and a generous meals area seating 4 ? 6. The functional updated Kitchen is equipped with gas cooking and offers ample cupboards.
Down the hall you will find 3 generous size bedrooms, 2 with BIR?s and all with great natural light & new carpets.
The Central bathroom has been updated and offers a spacious modern shower, heat lamps and plenty of vanity storage.
Outside boasts an under cover pergola area with café blinds, perfect for BBQ?s. There is also a rear grassed yard, garden shed and 2000L rain water tank with electric pump.
The DLUG with remote door will accommodate 2 small cars or would make for a perfect workshop.
This home or sound investment has charm and is ideally located in a good pocket of Whittington, walking distance to Newcomb shops and close to schools, sporting facilities and Buckleys entertainment centre.
FEATURES
658m2
AC / HEAT
DLUG
Ample parking
Rent pw est $300

Description:
RENT, RENOVATE or DEVELOP (735m2) .... MONEY TO BE MADE
Whether you are looking for a renovation project or the potential to subdivide and develop (STCA) this 4bd, 1 bath property on a large 735m2 block is A MUST TO INSPECT!
Located in a blue chip and growing pocket of Whittington, and being only a stones throw from two shopping strips, local schools and all sporting complex. This property SCREAMS POTENTIAL !
Consisting of a character 4 bed, 1 bath, 2 living weatherboard home with a back extension and a large DLUG. Offering Master bedroom with BIR and great light, a formal dining and front lounge which could make an extra bedroom or study space. A neat central kitchen equipped with upright cooker, ample storage and room for a small meals table. There is also a second living at the rear extension plus two smaller bedrooms. Step outside and you will be amazed at the space, with the ever green lush gardens, and fruit trees. This property really has loads of potential whether you live in now and renovate down the track, rent out at with an expected rent $250 - $260pw, or bulldoze and develop... there is money to be made!
FEATURES
2 living areas
735m2 flat block
Lush Gardens
Solid Location

Description:
Outstanding Opportunities!
A fantastic investment, first home or downsizer awaits the successful purchaser. Upon entry you are greeted with timber floorboards which continue through to the meals/kitchen area. The kitchen has been completely renovated and includes a breakfast bar and dishwasher. To the front of the home sits the family lounge room with large light filled windows with privacy blinds and block out blinds, split system to create all round comfort in crisp modern colours throughout. 3 Bedrooms, master with WIR & remaining bedrooms with BIR's. All rooms being serviced by the newly renovated bathroom which includes bath and shower. The spacious laundry with plenty of cupboard space, separate toilet and access to the yard.
This home also includes a separate teenager's retreat which is every parents dream. There is plenty of room for parking the camper or car including a single lock up garage and carport. With a paved entertainment area out the back and plenty of room for the kids to run amok this family home really is worth a look.
Positioned in a blue chip street and offers a great level of privacy and only moments from Buckley's Entertainment Centre, White Eagle House, Saint Albans Reserve, Barwon Valley Golf Club and only a 10 minute drive to Belmont shopping precinct and Barwon River.
Inspection is a must!

This fabulous first home or investment opportunity in an owner occupied tranquil complex is literally in walking distance to all of the must have amenities including Newcomb Shopping Centre, Schools, Public Transport, Medical Clinics, Swim Sport & Leisure Centre plus Walking Trails only moments away.
This wonderful two bedroom one bathroom unit offers a light and airy open plan kitchen to living zone with gas heating and cooking. Both good sized bedrooms comprise built in wardrobes and are serviced by the main bathroom. The separate laundry leads out to an ample sized court yard and with a single lock up garage, this unit won't last long! Move in or lease out
The property offers tenants in place until 29th October 2016 paying $220 per week (5.4% pa yield), and they would be happy to renew their lease for an additional 12 months if given the opportunity.

Description:
Downsize and invest in easy living
An easy low maintenance lifestyle is assured at this welcoming unit. The low maintenance home is set in secure surrounds of a quiet Whittington complex, providing the investor or owner occupier with great appreciation for its appeal and close proximity to public transport, major shopping and conveniences. The 2BR brick unit is bright and well maintained, and is currently tenanted with a long term tenant at $200pw, demonstrating its potential for terrific long term investment. The comfortable home has a spacious living room, a functional and adequately equipped kitchen, laundry and bathroom serving the bedrooms. Low maintenance surrounds including a private courtyard means less work and more time to enjoy the comforts of home or a walk to the popular and picturesque Bellarine Rail Trail. A single carport plus on-street parking completes this terrific property which is perfect for investing or downsizing. Inspect today.
